it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game

Class GameConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.GameConfig

  • public class GameConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    singleton class which contains all the game configuration setting loaded from external JSON file during the Setup start phase. GameConfig is called in many parts of the code every time a game configuration must be retrived.
    • bonusSpace: the bonus of all the action space of the board
    • bonusTileList: the list of all the personal bonus tile of the game
    • excommunicationTrack: HashMap which map each position of the faith track to the corresponding victory points bonus
    • pointsConversion: the rules applied by the EndPhaseHandler to compute the final score
    • instance: the instance of this singleton classk
    See Also:
    PersonalBonusTile
